subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: LeBron James tried to reassure Heat fans that he is committed to helping the Heat win an N.B.A. title this season before he and the Heat defeated the Cavaliers, 111-87, in Cleveland.
snippet: LeBron James tried to reassure Heat fans that he is committed to helping the Heat win an N.B.A. title this season before he and the Heat defeated the Cavaliers, 111-87, in Cleveland.
